goal.en: Through reading G4 Sustainability Reporting Guidelines to understand and use knowledge about sustainability Reporting.
goal.ch: 透過閱讀Global Reporting Initiative所公布的GRI Standards Sustainability Reporting Guidelines，並輔以閱讀公司所發佈之永續發展報告書，以瞭解永續發展報告。

content.en:
"Papers assigned about cost stickiness are
Paper 1. Anderson, M., R. Banker, and S. Janakiraman. 2003. Are selling, general and administrative costs “sticky”? Journal of Accounting Research 41 (1): 47–63.
Paper 2. Banker, R. D., D. Byzalov, M. Ciftci, and R. Mashruwala. 2014. The moderating effect of prior sales changes on asymmetric cost behavior. Journal of Management Accounting Research 26(2): 221-242.
Paper 3. Habib, A., and M. M. Hasan. 2015. Corporate social responsibility and cost stickiness. Available at SSRN 2638593.
Paper 4. Banker, R. D., and D. Byzalov. 2014. Asymmetric cost behavior. Journal of Management Accounting Research 26(2): 43-79.
Paper 5. Kama, I. and D. Weiss. 2013, Do Earnings targets and managerial incentives affect sticky costs? Journal of Accounting Research, 51(1): 201–224.
Materials assigned about sustainability reporting are
1. G4 Sustainability Reporting Guidelines, including Reporting-Principles-and-Standard-Disclosures and Implementation-Manual.
2. TSMC 2014 CSR Report"
content.ch:
"1. 指南的目的，使用方法與準則
2. 內容原則
3. 品質原則
4. 策略與分析 組織概況
5. 鑑別重大考量面與邊界
6. 利害關係人議合 報告書基本資料 治理 倫理與誠信
7. 管理方針揭露
8. 經濟績效
9. 市場形象 間接經濟衝擊 採購實務
10. 環境
11. 勞工實務與尊嚴勞動
12. 人權
13. 社會
14. 產品責任"
